## nodejs.NodeImageBuildOptions.buildArgs property

Environment variables that should be present during docker build

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
buildArgs?: Environment;
```

## Remarks

This adds an `ARG <varName>` line to the Dockerfile for every variable in env, and sets the variable in the environment before running `docker build`<!-- -->.
